Trader > Bookings > Rambo (Settlement) >

ETF TRS AP Price Adjustment Generation

Given

Several APPROVED Sell LEPO / Buy Asset orders exist for the trade date 22-08-2011

Currency Gross Dividend Rate Tax Rate Executed Quantity Trade Date Settlement Date Price Adjustment
EUR 3.5 0.801 20000 22-08-2011 25-08-2011 13,930
EUR 3.6 0.10 23100 22-08-2011 25-08-2011 74,844
EUR 3.7 0.12 4000 22-08-2011 26-08-2011 13,024
JPY 3.1 0.21 6000 22-08-2011 28-08-2011 14,694
JPY 3.8 0.21 6000 22-08-2011 28-08-2011 18,012
JPY 3.2 0.18 5500 22-08-2011 29-08-2011 14,432

These values will be grouped by settlement date and currency in the sheet.

When

The ETF TRS AP Price Adjustment is requested

Then

A spreadsheet with the same data as ETF TRS AP Price Adjustment is generated (see actual sheet generated for details).

So that the IB Operational Support team are aware of the transaction and can make appropriate adjustments to the OTC settlement system.
